dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so I've got a pretty wild story out of Kazakhstan for you this week. Uh, definitely falls into the "what were they thinking?" category.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so I've got a pretty wild story out of Kazakhstan for you this week. Uh, definitely falls into the what were they thinking category.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, do tell. I'm always ready for a bit of international bizarre news.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, do tell. I'm always ready for a bit of international bizarre news.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so picture this: a 44-year-old guy, an Almaty resident, has just been sentenced to four years in prison.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so picture this: a forty four-year-old guy, an Almaty resident, has just been sentenced to four years in prison.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A 44-year-old resident of Almaty has been sentenced to four years in prison for repeatedly making false bomb threats targeting railway stations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Four years, okay. What'd he do? Like, fraud? Robbery?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Four years, okay. What'd he do? Like, fraud? Robbery?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Nope, not exactly. He was making false bomb threats. Repeatedly. Targeting railway stations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope, not exactly. He was making false bomb threats. Repeatedly. Targeting railway stations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A 44-year-old resident of Almaty has been sentenced to four years in prison for repeatedly making false bomb threats targeting railway stations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, repeatedly? Like, more than once? And... false bomb threats?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, repeatedly? Like, more than once? And false bomb threats?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, uh, four separate phone calls, actually. And here's the kicker: he made these calls from a payphone while he was *already* serving a sentence in a correctional facility.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, uh, four separate phone calls, actually. And here's the kicker: he made these calls from a payphone while he was already serving a sentence in a correctional facility.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While serving a sentence in a correctional facility, the convict made four phone calls from a payphone, falsely claiming that explosive devices had been planted at railway stations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh. He was *already* in prison and decided, "You know what? I'm gonna make some bomb threats today." What?!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh. He was already in prison and decided, You know what? I'm gonna make some bomb threats today. What?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Absolutely baffling. From a payphone, claiming explosive devices had been planted.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Absolutely baffling. From a payphone, claiming explosive devices had been planted.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While serving a sentence in a correctional facility, the convict made four phone calls from a payphone, falsely claiming that explosive devices had been planted at railway stations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So he's basically just... adding time onto his sentence, for fun? Or what even is the motive there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So he's basically just adding time onto his sentence, for fun? Or what even is the motive there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, motive aside, it wasn't fun for anyone else. Each call, you know, prompted this massive emergency response. Evacuations, building inspections, canine units, bomb squads... the whole shebang.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, motive aside, it wasn't fun for anyone else. Each call, you know, prompted this massive emergency response. Evacuations, building inspections, canine units, bomb squads the whole shebang.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Each call prompted an emergency response involving evacuations, building inspections, and the deployment of canine units and bomb squads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Oh, the chaos that causes! All those resources, just, like, completely tied up for nothing. It's infuriating.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, the chaos that causes! All those resources, just, like, completely tied up for nothing. It's infuriating.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And it wasn't cheap either. The false alarms caused over 3.3 million tenge in damages to public agencies. That's, uh, quite a chunk of change.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And it wasn't cheap either. The false alarms caused over three point three million tenge in damages to public agencies. That's, uh, quite a chunk of change.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The false alarms caused over 3.3 million tenge in damages to public agencies, the transport prosecutor’s office stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Unbelievable. What was he even *thinking*? So what's the new sentence on top of his existing one?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unbelievable. What was he even thinking? So what's the new sentence on top of his existing one?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the court handed down another four-year prison sentence. And, um, he's been ordered to fully reimburse all those damages to the affected organizations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the court handed down another four-year prison sentence. And, um, he's been ordered to fully reimburse all those damages to the affected organizations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Taking into account the repeat nature of the offense, the court handed down a four-year prison sentence. In addition to serving time, the offender has been ordered to fully reimburse the damages and compensate affected organizations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Good. I mean, honestly. It's not a joke, you know? You just can't mess with that stuff. Like, remember that other Almaty resident who got in trouble for joking about a bomb boarding a flight?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Good. I mean, honestly. It's not a joke, you know? You just can't mess with that stuff. Like, remember that other Almaty resident who got in trouble for joking about a bomb boarding a flight?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, another Almaty resident found himself in legal trouble for joking while preparing to board a flight.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. The Transport Prosecutor's Office really emphasized that. They're, uh, warning that such crimes seriously undermine public safety and have major consequences.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. The Transport Prosecutor's Office really emphasized that. They're, uh, warning that such crimes seriously undermine public safety and have major consequences.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Transport Prosecutor’s Office warns that such crimes undermine public safety and have serious consequences, the statement added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. You just, you can't be messing around with that kind of stuff. It's just not funny.
